definitions.text: a series of steps to be carried out or goals to be accomplished
examples: they drew up a six-step plan
they discussed plans for a new bond issue
the awkward design of the keyboard made operation difficult
it was an excellent design for living
the plans for City Hall were on file

definitions.text: have the will and intention to carry out some action
examples: He plans to be in graduate school next year
The rebels had planned turmoil and confusion
He is planning a trip with his family

definitions.text: make or work out a plan for; devise
examples: They contrived to murder their boss

definitions.text: make a design of; plan out in systematic, often graphic form
examples: plan the new wing of the museum
